hooks.prompt: If an agent was active during this session, remind the user to run /session-end before closing to persist memory updates.

Check if there are uncommitted memory updates (session-log.md, mistakes.md, decisions.md, cheatsheets). If so, warn that context compaction will lose uncommitted work and suggest running /session-end first.

hooks.command: echo '[agentsouls] Reminder: If you completed work, run /session-end before closing.'
